data.eml:eml: Persescaphium pari new genus and species, with an overview of Iranian Scaphidiinae (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ivan Löbl, Ryo Ogawa (2016): Persescaphium pari new genus and species, with an overview of Iranian Scaphidiinae (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae). Entomologische Blätter und Coleoptera 112 (2): 35-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.887031
